entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Snow or periods of ice pellets in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
